title: Forming expressions and equations
question_text: Andrew is 4 years older than Brian, who is n years old. How old is Andrew, in terms of n? Choose from the options below.
Andrew is 4 years older than Brian, who is n years old. 5 years ago, Andrew was 3 times as old as Brian was. Form an equation and solve it to find the value of n. Choose from the options below.
How old will Andrew be in 3 years time? Choose from the options below.
Apples cost a pence each and bananas cost b pence each. 2 apples and 3 bananas cost 90 pence. Choose the correct equation in terms of a and b below.
8 apples cost the same as 6 bananas. Choose the correct equation in terms of a and b below.
Therefore, if 2 apples and 3 bananas cost 90 pence and 8 apples cost the same as 6 bananas. Find the price of the apple.
A farmer keeps h hens and p pigs. He has a total of 68 hens and pigs. Which is the correct equation in terms of hens and pigs?. (Write down this equation for the question 9)
If the hens and pigs have 152 legs between them, which is the correct equation below to show this. (Write down this equation for question 9).
